Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology has been proven to be a highly efficient electro-chemical device that directly converts chemical energy into electrical energy with a potential to increase system efficiencies and to significantly reduce emissions in oil and gas operations.
Titulo: Techno-economic and environmental assessment of integrating SOFC with a conventional steam and power system in a natural gas processing plant

Sentencas: Enabling an effective integration and smarter utilization of SOFC systems at different scales and point-of-use can lead to an overall system efficiency improvement.
Titulo: Techno-economic and environmental assessment of integrating SOFC with a conventional steam and power system in a natural gas processing plant

Sentencas: In this research paper, two case studies, including the steam and power system in a gas plant, are considered for comparative analysis purposes.
Titulo: Techno-economic and environmental assessment of integrating SOFC with a conventional steam and power system in a natural gas processing plant

Sentencas: The first case study, base case, is a traditional steam and power system in a natural gas processing plant and the proposed case is the combined steam and power system with SOFC unit.
Titulo: Techno-economic and environmental assessment of integrating SOFC with a conventional steam and power system in a natural gas processing plant

Sentencas: Techno-economic and environmental analyses are performed for both cases.
Titulo: Techno-economic and environmental assessment of integrating SOFC with a conventional steam and power system in a natural gas processing plant

Sentencas: To carry out a comparative analysis, the power output of both cases is fixed at 20 MW.
Titulo: Techno-economic and environmental assessment of integrating SOFC with a conventional steam and power system in a natural gas processing plant

Sentencas: The results of this study show that a reduction of almost 35% in the emissions is possible and the cost of electricity becomes about 25% less for the proposed case.
Titulo: Techno-economic and environmental assessment of integrating SOFC with a conventional steam and power system in a natural gas processing plant
